descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i68.tinypic.com/2cncnk9.jpg[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]VANILLA LIGHT ENB

[/size][/font][font=Arial]System specs:
1. Core i3 4170 (3.7ghz)
2. radeon r9 390,
3. 8gb ddr3

**together with 2k textures for Skyrim, the average fps is around 30-40fps ( in cities and during combat). [/font]

This enb is based on Opethfeldt ENB by [b]Opethfeldt[/b] !! 

[youtube]bc6tIOF4dk4[/youtube]



[font=Verdana][size=4]Instructions:[/size][/font]
[font=Arial]
[/font][b][font=Arial][size=2]1. Copy/paste everything in the file into your Skyrim main folder
[/size]2. Copy/paste the "d3d9.dll" and the "enbhost" file from the wrapper version of the lastest ENB binaries by Boris
[/font]3. Enjoy!!
[/b]

[img]http://i68.tinypic.com/33a9mw9.jpg[/img]

[b][font=Verdana][size=3]Requirements:[/size][/font]

[/b]Enhanced Lights and FX - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?

To achieve the results from the screenshots; used only:

[b][font=Tahoma]1.THE CORE FILES IN THE ENHANCED LIGHTS AND FX[/font]
[font=Tahoma]2. ELFX EXTERIORS only[/font]

[youtube]DblT4K-iN7Y[/youtube]
[font=Georgia][size=4]I thank the whole community of Skyrim nexus for providing us with great mods every day. [/size][/font]

[/b]
author: scordj
